name: Look At The Circle
description:
Look at the Circle is a test game created by two mads in their houses. Look at the Circle borns like a stupid idea of create a game where the objective is look at a circle.

With the passage of time we decided to add it some features like powerups and stats.

Now Look at the Circle is in open beta (we need to search more bugs), download it now!

DO YOU LIKE FUCKING CIRCLES?! DOWNLOAD IT RIGHT NOW FUUUCK!
